author: Deric Phillips
subject: Arsene Lupin (the e-book)
body:
I don't know if any of you have found this yet, but the Gutenberg Project at 
http://promo.net/pg/ has free e-book versions of three whole Arsene Lupin 
books - Arsene Lupin, the Crystal Stopper, and Hollow Needle.
